problem.markdown:
1. Current ratios are in _________ of the voltage ratio.
() Direct ratio (x) Inverse ratio () Power ratio
2. A current transformer is a
() Step down transformer (x) Step up transformer () None () Both step up transformer and step down transformer
3. The use of ________ for high voltage applications is becoming more common.
() Porcelain () Oil (x) Polymer () All
4. When 1 or 2 percentage of cadmium is added to copper it __________ the tensile strength by ________ but ________ the conductivity by ________.
() Increases, 17% , decreases, 40% () Decreases, 40% , Increases, 20% (x) Increases, 40% , decreases, 17% () Decreases, 20% , Increases, 40%
5. The advantage of using suspension type insulators over pin-type insulators is _________
(x) All () Cheaper in cost for operating voltage above 50kV () If line insulation needs to be increased, the additional insulators can be easily added to the string () Flexibility is increased with suspension insulators
problem.p: 1. Current ratios are in _________ of the voltage ratio.

choicegroup.choice: Both step up transformer and step down transformer

problem.p: 3. The use of ________ for high voltage applications is becoming more common.
4. When 1 or 2 percentage of cadmium is added to copper it __________ the tensile strength by ________ but ________ the conductivity by ________.
5. The advantage of using suspension type insulators over pin-type insulators is _________

choicegroup.choice: Cheaper in cost for operating voltage above 50kV
If line insulation needs to be increased, the additional insulators can be easily added to the string
Flexibility is increased with suspension insulators
